testcase.name: testBcryptDecryptShouldSupportLegacyKeyDerivationProcess
testcase.system-err: [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptorGroovyTest - Plaintext: This is a plaintext message. [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptorGroovyTest - [TEST] Using fixed Bcrypt salt: $2a$12$bTe91I2TRY6.hYwJ1cSPE. The value can be obtained in the calling code by invoking 'cipher.getIV()'; [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptorGroovyTest - Cipher text (91): 24326124313224637756687157526f5a2e46613073464e49517577784f4e69466953414c541e9c133accfe61742b44a1e71f6f59d04e6946694956194e01d5ba75dd4de88a420f84c0bca6f4b23c12fbbc73e21304b278a95d5e86 [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Creating Bcrypt hash with salt [7b25e3b184ea6c01dcdae1cf292c32cd] (16 bytes) [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Generated Bcrypt hash in 280 ms [main] WARN org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptor - Error decrypting content using Bcrypt-derived key; attempting legacy key derivation for backward compatibility [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Creating Bcrypt hash with salt [7b25e3b184ea6c01dcdae1cf292c32cd] (16 bytes) [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Generated Bcrypt hash in 278 ms [main] WARN org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.KeyDerivationBcryptSecureHasher - Using Legacy Key Derivation on bcrypt hash including cost and salt [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptorGroovyTest - Plaintext (29): This is a plaintext message.

testcase.name: testScryptSaltShouldBe16Bytes
